newsitem.title: USA: Access to buy PaperClip Software.
newsitem.headline: Access to buy PaperClip Software.

text.p: Access Solutions International Inc will buy the assets and certain liabilities of PaperClip Software Inc for $5.79 million, the companies said Tuesday.
The purchase price will be paid by the delivery of about 1.544 million shares of Access common stock plus 1.544 million Access Class B Warrants.
Each warrant will entitle the holder to purchase one share of Access common stock at an exercise price of $6 per share, they said.
The two firms will operate under the Access name once the deal is complete, but the PaperClip product name will be retained.
Rhode Island-based Access Solutions develops, manufactures and markets mainframe information storage and retrieval systems, including both hardware and software.
PaperClip, of Hackensack, N.J., makes software for document management and imaging systems, primarily for use in networked systems.
